news_header: DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup, has paused its chatbot app downloads in South Korea due to privacy concerns. The apps were removed from local app stores, and the company is collaborating with South Korean authorities to enhance privacy protections.
news_original_title: South Korea pauses downloads of DeepSeek&#8217;s AI apps due to privacy concerns
news_text: Users who already downloaded the app are advised to delete it or refrain from entering personal information. DeepSeek gained attention for its cost-effective chatbot, but concerns over data privacy have led to restrictions from South Korean agencies.
